data.title: Into the light
data.meta_description: ONLY AN ALL-OPTICAL COMMUNICATIONS NETWORK CAN MEET THE INSATIABLE DEMAND FOR BANDWIDTH. THE RACE IS ON TO PROVIDE ONE
data.text:
ONLY AN ALL-OPTICAL COMMUNICATIONS NETWORK CAN MEET THE INSATIABLE DEMAND FOR BANDWIDTH. THE RACE IS ON TO PROVIDE ONE

Picture yourself running a small technology start-up you have established in a rural community to keep costs down. Your product is a bland-looking optical network switching box. The product has begun to attract customers, and you hope to gross $US10 million this year.
